statements: It becomes clear...
The Sun was abandoned, in a prison of heart and wood.
With no one left, he drifted through a void, and his strength began to run out.
When all seemed lost, he realized how he could end his loneliness.
can anyone hear me
is anyone out there
Can you feel it?
Can you feel His loneliness?
His desire to help others, and connect with them...it is what brought us all here.
it has been so long
perhaps it is too late for me
there must be something wrong with me
is this what I really deserve
what is the point of this
everyone is better without me
...I'll have you know, I prefer being by myself.
I used to be around others, but they were always bothering me, so I left.
People are just a waste of time anyway.
It's important to be comfortable being by yourself.
You have to love yourself before you can love someone else, you know?
Oh...but I never learned how, so I ended up dying alone...
Maybe that's not really good advice...
BooOoOoOoOooo...
Oh, sorry.  I was just practicing my ghost noises.
Some day, I hope I can haunt lots of people with my sad lonely cries.
